In a message dated 5/10/03 10:52:35 PM Central Daylight Time, 
airly2002@... writes:


> "I'll be fine"said Blackstorm by com link.
> 
> 

"Fine is not what bothers me." Pausing a moment. "If the others know of this 
place, or worse... DON'T know of this place & followed or tracked us... it's 
guaranteed that they will eventually show. This is no place for a battle. Nor 
for wandering bots." Another pause. "I've set the defenses here at full 
around the perimeter. You are my only contact now with the other predacons, 
Blackstorm. Return to base, inform them that I shall be.. detained for a 
time. I shall return & report back soon. If you so desire, return to the 
outer perimeter as well. But I would prefer not. It may attract attention. & 
that is the LAST thing I want to do." 

Within her, she was so torn. She ached to return to the Predacon base. 
Curious to know of Hydras. She had to admit it, but she would never show it. 
Unless it was around him, privately.. no one else watching or nearby. 
Emotions were not something to have, specially for a Decepticon warrior. 

But as her optics went to the frozen limp form of the original Megatron... 
the ache was worse. 

 

--part1_2f.394a6008.2bef5f21_boundary
